text: 3:10 Rom 6:3-5; 8:17; 2 Korin 4:10-11; Galesia 6:17; 2 Timoti 2:11-12; 1 Pita 4:13Ezɨ kɨ Krais bar a gɨfoghasa. Krais mozimɨn ua dɨkavigha, gavgavir ekiam iti, ezɨ kɨ an gavgavir kam gɨfoghasa. Egh kɨ a ko mɨzaziba isir arazimɨn aven ikiam. Egh kɨ, nɨghnɨzir a suiragha ikia ovengezir kamra, kɨ uaghan an suiraghasa.
